price: Moisés disse: "O Senhor dos céus e da terra e do que há entre ambos, se estais convictos disso."
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
